promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi young strong dragonfly grass-type pokemon with a ancient crystal core. It can be found in jungle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or dragonfly. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crystinsecta, a a chibi young strong dragonfly grass-type pokemon. It can be found in jungle-like environments It has the following abilities: Chloroscythe-GX. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "dragonfly", "grass" or "Crystinsecta". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, dragonfly-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, emerald bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: Hidden amidst lush foliage, this vibrant chibi critter utilizes Chloroscythe-GX to slice seeds mid-air. It's a verdant aerial maestro.
